00018 XLevelMeter::XLevelMeter(const char *name, bool runtime, 
00019                      const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00020                      const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00021                      const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00022                      const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00023     XPrimaryDriver(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00024 {
00025 }

00031 void
00032 XLevelMeter::start()
00033 {
00034     m_thread.reset(new XThread<XLevelMeter>(shared_from_this(), &XLevelMeter::execute));
00035     m_thread->resume();
00036 }
00037 void
00038 XLevelMeter::stop()
00039 {
00040     if(m_thread) m_thread->terminate();
00041 //    m_thread->waitFor();
00042 //  thread must do interface()->close() at the end
00043 }
00044 
00045 void
00046 XLevelMeter::analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&)
00047 {
00048     for(unsigned int ch = 0; ch < m_entries.size(); ch++) {
00049         m_levelRecorded[ch] = pop<double>();
00050         m_entries[ch]->value(m_levelRecorded[ch]);
00051     }
00052 }
00053 void
00054 XLevelMeter::visualize()
00055 {
00056     //! impliment extra codes which do not need write-lock of record
00057     //! record is read-locked
00058 }
00059 
00060 void
00061 XLevelMeter::createChannels(const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00062     const char **channel_names)
00063 {
00064   shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> entries(scalarentries);
00065   
00066   for(int i = 0; channel_names[i]; i++) {
00067         shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entry(create<XScalarEntry>(
00068             channel_names[i]
00069           , false,
00070            dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this())
00071           , "%.4g"));
00072          m_entries.push_back(entry);
00073          entries->insert(entry);
00074     }
00075     m_levelRecorded.resize(m_entries.size());
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 void *
00080 XLevelMeter::execute(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00081 {   
00082     while(!terminated)
00083     {
00084         msecsleep(100);
00085         
00086         clearRaw();
00087         // try/catch exception of communication errors
00088         try {
00089             unsigned int num = m_entries.size();
00090             for(unsigned int ch = 0; ch < num; ch++)
00091                 push((double)getLevel(ch));
00092         }
00093         catch (XKameError &e) {
00094             e.print(getLabel());
00095             continue;
00096         }
00097  
00098         finishWritingRaw(XTime::now(), XTime::now());
00099     }
00100     afterStop();    
00101     return NULL;
00102 }
